item.title: Immigration to Canada via Express Entry
item.description: How to immigrate to Canada via Express Entry If you ever wanted to move to Canada, this is the time. Canada is planning on bringing more than 1 million immigrants in the next 3 years! Dmitrii Pashtuskii is a digital nomad living in Bali, and he’s planning his Immigration process to Canada via Express Entry. We recorded a podcast episode and Dimitrii asked us questions about moving to Canada because he wants to apply for a visa very soon:

item.title: Shape Up: Stop Running in Circles and Ship Work that Matters
item.description: About Shape Up Shape Up is an agile product development approach used internally by Basecamp. It has three distinct phases: Shaping The product strategy team writes a pitch that describes the problem that needs to be solved, giving as much detail as needed, and proposes a solution. The level of detail should be specific enough so that the team working on the project knows what to do. It should also leave enough room so the team can figure out the best way to build a solution that fits scope and budget constraints.
